Title: Chicken and Rice with Broccoli Recipe
Ingredients: 2 ½ pounds bone-in, skin-on chicken legs or other chicken parts, Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 large onion, chopped (1 ½ cups), 2 small heads broccoli, cut into florets (about 2 cups), 3 medium cloves garlic, minced or grated with a microplane (about 1 tablespoon), 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon turmeric or pinch of saffron threads, 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper (plus more to taste if desired), 3 cups homemade homemade or store-bought low sodium chicken broth, 1 ½ cups basmati or long-grain white rice, 3/4 cup frozen peas, 2 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley leaves, Lemon or lime wedges, for serving
Instructions:
Start by gathering the following ingredients: 2 ½ pounds bone-in, skin-on chicken legs or other chicken parts, Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 large onion, chopped (1 ½ cups), 2 small heads broccoli, cut into florets (about 2 cups), 3 medium cloves garlic, minced or grated with a microplane (about 1 tablespoon), 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon turmeric or pinch of saffron threads, 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper (plus more to taste if desired), 3 cups homemade homemade or store-bought low sodium chicken broth, 1 ½ cups basmati or long-grain white rice, 3/4 cup frozen peas, 2 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley leaves, Lemon or lime wedges, for serving. Prepare the dish categorized as a main course. Follow these steps:
1. Begin by preparing your workspace. Clean your vegetables and proteins. 2. Heat up your pan (or oven, depending on the dish) to a medium temperature. 3. For proteins like chicken or meat, cook them thoroughly until browned on all sides and fully cooked inside.
4. If your recipe includes vegetables, sauté them until tender but still crisp. 5. Add seasonings and any sauces to taste. 6. Once everything is cooked and well-combined, give it a final stir. 7. Serve the main course hot. This dish is suitable for Dairy-Free, Gluten-Free, Wheat-Free, Egg-Free, Peanut-Free, Tree-Nut-Free, Soy-Free, Fish-Free, Shellfish-Free, Pork-Free, Red-Meat-Free, Crustacean-Free, Celery-Free, Mustard-Free, Sesame-Free, Lupine-Free, Mollusk-Free, Alcohol-Free, Sulfite-Free, Kosher.
